trans:
ğŸ™ï¸: "After the Olympics, I had a medical consultation at a foreign clinic. That's when it turned out I had a problem with a ligament in my knee. The club, Suntory Sunbirds, treated me very well. They allowed me to recover calmly, thanks to which I will be ready for the rest of the season.
ğŸ™ï¸: - My goal is to finally make my debut for Suntory in the match against Tokyo in less than two weeks. I don't know if it'll be in both matches or just episodically, but I'd like to play with Ma[redacted_name] then. ğŸ™ï¸: - Players in Japan train and prepare in a slightly different way. I constantly consult with Pio[redacted_name] who helps me stay in good shape and get healthy, especially now. This is a continuation of my past work, I wanted to have a trusted person by my side.
ğŸ™ï¸: - Suntory's midfielder Masa[redacted_name] is a very interesting guy. He's knocking louder and louder on the door of the Japanese national team. He's short, but he has great technique and a head for unconventional solutions. A year ago he led Suntory to gold at the Japanese championship. ğŸ™ï¸
ğŸ™ï¸: - I am positively surprised by the level of the games, these two opening matches of the league season with Osaka Bluteon were really good and could be enjoyed. I could watch it from the stands and this Japanese spectacularity is impressive.
